PSA 3/3: It is not sexist to critique the @aflwomens league; unless claiming it's lesser because the athletes are women. That is sexist.
PSA 2/3: @aflwomens is similar to the @AFL, but with less players on the field it may 'feel' different. That has nothing to do with gender.
PSA 1/3: The skills of athletes in their first season are never equal to those more advanced careers; that has nothing to do with gender.
